rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a Kerala-style wooden archway and traditional murals.
An open dining area with a traditional Kerala-style wooden dining table and seating arrangements.
Functional kitchen designed with local materials, featuring ample storage and cooking space.
Spacious living room with high ceilings to enhance natural light and ventilation, adorned with traditional Kerala decor.
Comfortable living space for the servants, ensuring privacy and functionality.
Separate toilet facility for guests on the ground floor, ensuring convenience.
Ground floor bathroom integrated with the living room area for ease of access.

openings.description: Traditional wooden front door with intricate carvings aligned with Vastu principles.
Double entry for two-car garage ensuring easy vehicular access.
Louvered windows in living areas and bedrooms to allow cross ventilation and natural light.
